title: Behind the Blog: TikTok Ban and Pornhub Blocks
description: This is Behind the Blog, where we share our behind-the-scenes thoughts about how a few of our top stories of the week came together. This week, we discuss iterative journalism, security through obscurity, Pornhub abandoning Texas and the TikTok ban.

title: Cleaner for SWAT Team Leaks DEA Investigative File on Her Fentanyl Dealing Cousin
description: In an unusual insider threat case, a cleaner working in a SWAT office allegedly snapped photos of a DEA investigative file and leaked them.

title: Horrific AI-Generated Breastfeeding Images Bypass Facebook’s Moderation
description: A page called Mom Daily is using AI-generated images of mothers and babies to bypass Facebook’s rules on nudity, with some really terrifying results.

title: How a Foul Ball From 2014 Became Part of a Russian Disinformation Campaign
description: Using OSINT and Baseball Reference to determine the exact pitch that was used in a Russian disinformation video.
